..., and I don't want to give away too much. For those of you who are not familiar with the history of the movie, I'd like to say that this movie is very different from the rest of it. First of all, the story is based on a true story about one of Europe's greatest war heroes, Otto von Bismarck, who was captured by the Germans at the beginning of World War II. The movie takes place during the Second World Wars, but unlike the first film, there are no flashbacks to the war. Instead, we are introduced to Otto Von Bismsarcker, a man whose identity is revealed in the second film. What makes the film unique is the fact that the character of Otto is played by a young girl, Katerina, played extremely well by Helen Mirren.
